S04bsu061_u:2988: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ 'vimalakīrtinirdeśaṃ' vā 'yamakavyatyastābhinirhāraṃ' vāpy 'acintyavimokṣaparivartannāma' dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāraya" /
S04bsu061_u:2990_0: āttamanā licchavirvimalakīrtirmajuśrīśca kumārabhūtaḥ sa cāyuṣmānānandaste ca bodhisattvāte
S04bsu061_u:2990_1: ca mahāśrāvakāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣatsadevamānuṣāsura gandharvaśca loko bhagavato
